Posts.Content: Mar 12, 2009 02:19AM Solihull wrote: I had a lumpectomy and then had to go back in a second time as they had not removed enough after that I developed a seroma (fluid in the breast) I did not have a drain fitted on either of the operations. I am now due to go back in 2 weeks for a third operation where they say they are going to do quilting.  Dont know what this means and if they will fit a drain this time, if anyone has any information I would be grateful. Solihull
Posts.Title: Drains & Time Off Work For Lumpectomy Kim32 Solihull
